sentences.sentence: If her husband became governor, Judge Rendell would have to recuse herself from cases involving the state.
sentences.translation: 如果她的丈夫当选州长，伦德尔法官将不得不在本州的案件中将自己撤换出来。

sentences.sentence: The first three days of proceedings had been taken up with defense notions to recuse.
sentences.translation: 前三天的诉讼程序主要是采用撤换辩护概念。

sentences.sentence: Article 48 the party shall have the right to request Customs officers to recuse themselves according to the provisions of the Customs Law.
sentences.translation: 第四十八条当事人有权根据海关法的规定要求海关工作人员回避。
